description: This notification is generated when device receives an arp packet,which
source IP address is the same IP address of the device.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwArpIPCollisionTrap HUAWEI-VLAN-MIB::hwVlanID i 9999 HUAWEI-VLAN-MIB::hwVlanIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwArpMacAddress s EXAMPL HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0

description: Indicates the corresponding VLAN ID of a VLAN interface.
variables.name: HUAWEI-VLAN-MIB::hwVlanID

description: Indicates the IP address of a VLAN interface.
Default: 0.0.0.0.
variables.name: HUAWEI-VLAN-MIB::hwVlanIpAddress

description: MAC Address of arp entry.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwArpMacAddress

description: The index of a shelf in the device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: A slot index is used to identify the location of a board in a shelf.
You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Port index, indicating the physical number of the port on a board.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex

description: This notification is generated when arp transfer one port
to another port.

event.Summary: ARP ($v2) transfered from one port to another port

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwArpTranferTrap HUAWEI-VLAN-MIB::hwVlanID i 9999 HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwArpTransferIP a 192.0.2.1 HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwOldFrameIndex u 9999 HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwOldSlotIndex u 9999 HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwOldPortIndex u 9999 HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwNewFrameIndex u 9999 HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwNewSlotIndex u 9999 HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwNewPortIndex u 9999

description: Indicates the corresponding VLAN ID of a VLAN interface.
variables.name: HUAWEI-VLAN-MIB::hwVlanID

description: IP Address of arp entry.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwArpTransferIP

description: The frame index before the arp transfer.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwOldFrameIndex

description: The slot index before the arp transfer.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwOldSlotIndex

description: The port before the arp transfer.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwOldPortIndex

description: The frame index after the arp transfer.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwNewFrameIndex

description: The slot index after the arp transfer.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwNewSlotIndex

description: The port after the arp transfer.
variables.name: HUAWEI-ARP-PROXY-MIB::hwNewPortIndex
